snippet: As Qatar raises its profile in the contemporary art world, dealers and artists don’t want to miss out.
abstract: Dealers, auction house experts, museum directors, collectors and artists from around the world descend on Doha, Qatar, both to support the many artists whose exhibitions are opening there and to do business of their own; city, whose art initiatives are funded by Qatari royal family and moneyed collectors, has become increasingly frequent stop on the global art tour.
lead_paragraph: As Qatar raises its profile in the contemporary art world, dealers and artists don’t want to miss out.

headline.seo: Eyes in Doha Are on Damien Hirsts and Warhols
headline.main: The Gang’s All There, Talking Art in Qatar
headline.print_headline: The Gang’s All There, Talking Art in Qatar
